summary: This operator performs a logical-NOT operation.
details: Unboxing will be performed, if necessary.
Return the result of the operation.
static-checks: The overload will not accept the operand due to its type.
example-1: module Main in examples;%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    val case1 = ! false;%0A    val case2 = ! true;%0A%0A    F::println(case1);%0A    F::println(case2);%0A}
